
list-verified-email-addresses
*****************************


DESCRIPTION
===========

Returns a list containing all of the email addresses that have been
verified.

Warning: The list-verified-email-addresses action is deprecated as of the May
  15, 2012 release of Domain Verification. The list-identities action
  is now preferred.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws ses list-verified-email-addresses


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

None


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

None
